content: **knitted hat and scarf in drops air the piece is worked in rib ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the almond whisper scarf pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #almondwhisperset drops design pattern ai-539 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- * **whole set** **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/xl **yarn for whole set** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 250-250-250 g colour 55 light beige ------------------------------------------------------- * **hat** **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/xl fits head circumference 54/56 56/58 - 58/60 cm **yarn for hat** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100-100 g colour 55 light beige **needles for hat** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle **knitting gauge for hat** 19 stitches in width and 25 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/261-58-almond-whisper-scarf
